column4: ok so rausb (the interface name for ralink wireless card) shows up in network manager, but it never connects or shows signal strength. We had to install drivers from source. there seems to be a disconnect between the two, as i can set manually using iwconfig and dhclient. Any Advice???
hmm is there an advanced discussion channel for ubuntu?
if there was, it would be empty haha
lol good point
got a problem you'd like licked?
well. I can discuss

ok so rausb (the interface name for ralink wireless card) shows up in network manager, but it never connects or shows signal strength. We had to install drivers from source. there seems to be a disconnect between the two, as i can set manually using iwconfig and dhclient. Any Advice???
So I'm gathering that iwconfig/dhclient works, but ifup doesn't?
checking getting werid action here
ifdown works
then ifup?
are you using ndiswrapper?
no, it worked though, got an address
network-manager says no connection thought, even though i hav eone
you have a doozy there... but wireless networking is still iffy sometimes.
are both connections supposed to be on roaming?
both?  You should have only one.
wired vs. wireless
oh the wired one shouldn't be roaming, i wouldn't think...
I'm still figuring out this new network applet myself.
probably just swap out the minipci wireless card in this laptop anyways
something common, like a broadcom or something
i have a broadcom - be warned, they're a bit tricky to set up too
